The researcher who disbelieved in their Lord, the torment of hell and the misery of destiny, this is permissible; Like it is not deluded that the torment is prepared for those who are in particular, and the meaning: and for all those who disbelieved in God the torment of hell, so what is the general in the general of the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is in the past The one who came up with the sentence before it, so it was sympathetic to it.And the progress of the boundary is to fulfill its attachment to the chain of transmission to it and its initiative.The sentence and the misery of the destiny is a state or an exposure to the creation of the defamation and the delegate of the seedlings of the vilification of what is before (misery) to it.And appreciation: and the misery of destiny is the torment of hell.The meaning: Hell was miserable as a destiny for those who disbelieved.
